an5.201:1.1: See BB for the reading nicula=Barringtonia acutangula, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barringtonia_acutangula
an5.201:1.3: This is one sutta where the choice of definite or indefinite article affects the interpretation. See BB’s note. I have used “the”, opting for the less cosmic interpretation. This, it seems to me, avoids the problem of assuming that the text occurs at a time when the comsic Buddha-cycle was well-known.
